channel.title: [PI] Vote 4 Cash
channel.description:
Hey guys, I don't know if this right section but anyways.
My vote 4 cash has been set up and it works good. The player puts their name in and clicks vote and then is redirected to the voting page where they can vote and then they do ::claim but I've realised that they can just put their username in and just click vote and not actually vote. How do I combat this?
Thanks

item.title: [PI] Vote 4 Cash
item.dc:creator: @FantasyXCoder FantasyXCoder
item.description:
@FantasyXCoder wrote:

A lot of people just have a timer, from when you click the button the vote site, to when you hit reward.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Vote 4 Cash
item.dc:creator: @Elfbow Elfbow
item.description:
@Elfbow wrote:

Mostly all servers do that, but they won’t find out on your server they will just think you have one?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Vote 4 Cash
item.dc:creator: @RegalX RegalX
item.description:
@RegalX wrote:

how do you add callback?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Vote 4 Cash
item.dc:creator: @xI_c_E xI c E
item.description:
@xI_c_E wrote:

Most / all of the tutorials for Vote4Cash will not work because they do not have a callback feature that calls back to the SQL server to say that the person voted.

Read full topic
